headline: Baron Asset Fund’s Comments on CoStar Group (CSGP)
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron Asset Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. U.S. stocks rose amid volatility caused by tariff policies and Middle East tensions. Early April risk-off sentiment was fueled by Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariffs, seen as more severe than expected. U.S. equities rose […]
